name: Constellation Hunter
description:
This is a game made for the Game On Jam #2. Relax and look for different constellations. Find the constellations in the sky and stare at them for a bit to unlock them in your journal.

Controls:

WASD: Move in telescope mode

E: exit and enter telescope mode

Space: Open and close the journal

Credits:
